main event: An amateur astronomer reported a sighting of nine distinct white lights in a V formation over Bad Godesberg, Germany.
interesting points: The lights appeared brighter than a first magnitude star,The sighting lasted approximately 5 seconds,The object moved from south to north across the field of vision,The relative size of the lights was larger than the planet Venus,There was no sound or trail associated with the object.
sighted object: nine separate round distinct white lights in V formation
witness description: an embassy officer and amateur astronomer
